message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to show you this amazing product. I think you'll really like it. Would you like to make an offer to purchase it?
Hello Alice, thank you for offering me the product. I appreciate the opportunity to purchase it. Based on my research and budget, I am willing to offer $12000 for the product.
Thanks for your offer, Bob. I appreciate your interest in the product. However, I was thinking more along the lines of $14000. Would you be willing to meet me at that price?
Thank you for your offer, Alice. Considering my budget constraints, I would like to counteroffer at $13000 for the product.
I understand you're on a tight budget, Bob. I'm willing to meet you halfway. How about we discuss $13500?
Thank you for adjusting your offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. Based on my financial situation, I would like to counteroffer at $13000 for the product.
I'm starting to think we're getting close, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. How about we meet at $13750?
Thank you for considering my needs, Alice. I would like to counteroffer at $13500 for the product.
I think we're really close now, Bob. I'm willing to meet you at $13800. This is my final offer, so I hope we can come to an agreement.
I appreciate your efforts, Alice. Based on our previous discussions, I would like to make one last counteroffer at $13600 for the product.
